title: Shortcuts
author: moosemeat
dependence: Adds a variety of shortcuts to some regions. You will need to reload the game for the changes to take effect.

title: CraftAnywhereRedux
author: moosemeat
dependence: Allows you to adjust the crafting location for vanilla craftable items.

title: NorthfolkClothingPack
author: Waltz
dependence:
Adds 2 previously seen + 3 brand new, inspired by northern folk, craftable clothes.

It's a standard ModComponent pack, installed by dropping it into .../Mods/

title: RavineBridgeFix
author: moosemeat
dependence: Fix the bridge in the Ravine..

title: ShootingRange
author: moosemeat
dependence: Enable shooting range targets, weather vane, hunting blind, and a warm barn near Pensive Pond in Pleasant Valley.

title: Architect
author: Waltz
dependence: Modular base building mod

title: FoodsbyCalorieWaltz
author: Waltz
dependence:
Adds 20+ unique, delicious food and beverage items. Insludes cute collectibles and handy settings!

Installed by unpacking it into .../Mods/

title: PathfindersAscent
author: moosemeat
dependence: An alternate version of Timberwolf Mountain, Blackrock, and Ash Canyon designed to offer a fresh and challenging experience for veteran survivors.

title: AllRandomLayoutsAtOnce
author: Romain
dependence: This mod allows you to combine all random layouts in the same run.

title: GearInfo
author: Waltz
dependence: Shows additional gear info in your inventory (there's a small (i) button next to gear name)

title: QoL
author: BA
dependence: Reduce UI frustration, even make it pleasant to use. You can now use keyboard most of the time to control your game.

title: MoreWood
author: Sm4rtBoyTom
dependence: This mod adds two new types of wood. Birch can be found near birch trees or forests. Oak firewood can sometimes be found near oak trees and occasionally in forests.

title: StalkerAidsAndSupplements
author: Sm4rtBoyTom
dependence: This mod expands on TLD's medical items. It's heavily inspired by S.T.A.L.K.E.R games, you may come across some refferences. :D

title: RepairableRepairables
author: Sm4rtBoyTom
dependence: Repairable Repairables, gives you the option to fix three of the basic tools used for repairing, crafting and sharpening. The tool that can be fixed are as follows: Rifle Cleaning Kit, Sewing Kit, whetstone/Sharpening Stone

title: ChangeCustomSettings
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Lets you change the difficulty settings of a running game

title: GearDecayModifier
author: Romain
dependence: Mod for The Long Dark to modify decay rates of gear. Settings go from completely stopping decay to making it much faster. Various categories to change.

title: ModSettings
author: Digitalzombie
dependence:
Lets other mods display their settings in-game. This mod doesn't do anything on its own and should only be used as a dependency for other mods.

Thanks zeobviouslyfakeacc, for all your work!

title: InfiniteCheatDeath
author: Marcy
dependence: A simple mod that allows infinite respawning. Each time you respawn, your life count will be set back to 3, allowing respawning infinitely. This mod does not remove respawn penalties, they are still present.

title: FriendlyInlet
author: moosemeat
dependence: Make Bleak Inlet more friendly by redistributing wood spawns to the coast and reduce and relocate some wolf spawns.

title: HouseLights
author: Marcy
dependence: Magically brings back electricity on Great Bear! You can turn lights on and off anywhere using light switches.

title: FoodPackbyTKG
author: Thekillergreece
dependence:
Introduces 38 new food items to the game.

This mod was expanded with Waltz's mod in mind so be sure to download that one too!

title: SafehouseCustomizationPlus
author: Waltz
dependence:
Enables customization everywhere, allows to move and pick up containers, stoves, workbenches and many more.

WARNING! Consider this mod expeimental. There was no reports of losing item, but the possibility is still there. Make save backups just in case

title: FuelManager
author: The Illusion
dependence: Fuel Manager adds QOL features to assist with managing various fuel items. This includes all features of Better-Fuel-Management.

title: ResearchBookTweaker
author: Romain
dependence: Formely Shorter Read Intervals Mod

title: BetterNightSky
author: TLD Modding Community
dependence: Makes the night sky more realistic.Replaces the Moon and Stars with a more detailed representation. Adds meteor showers.

title: HUDImprovements
author: Sm4rtBoyTom
dependence:
HUD Improvements mod adds ability to enable or disable certain, potentially annoying, HUD elements via ModSettings.
Big thanks to DigitalZombie for allowing me to merge this mod together with his Yes I Know mod
Disables the hover text on items and / or fires. You've played the game long enough, you know how a stick looks like.

title: ImprovedFlasks
author: Fuar
dependence: A gameplay mod that adds new QOL functionality to insulated flasks.

title: TravoisTether
author: Waltz
dependence: Prevents travois from despawning

title: MooseSatchelMod
author: ttr
dependence: Reduce scent and decay for meat, fish and guts and pies, if wearing Moose Bag

title: RareExclusiveLoot
author: Thekillergreece
dependence: Items available in Bunkers and/or Trader now appear in the world, albeit rare and in low numbers.

title: ImprovedTales
author: Fuar
dependence: Improves the Signal Void Tale with QOL customization options.

title: FireAddons
author: ttr
dependence: Smoldering Ash, cooking time based on temperature, different tinder have different fire starting buffs. Details in readme on github.

title: SonicMode
author: ds5678
dependence:
Lets you go fast!

Patreon

title: StretchArmstrong
author: TLD Modding Community
dependence: Change the range at which you can interact with things.

title: HungerRevamped
author: TLD Modding Community
dependence: Improves the hunger system by separating hunger and stored calories. Adds customization options for cooking such as enabling cooking ruined food.

title: InventoryReassignments
author: moosemeat
dependence: This is a mod for The Long Dark that allows players to reassign various gear items to different inventory categories.

title: DroppableUndroppables
author: Marcy
dependence: Allows moving all possible items, and removing of all previously non-droppable items from inventory. Gives option to turn collectibles into regular items for immersion. Optionally adds weight to items that should have it but do not.

title: BetterSkillXP
author: Romain
dependence: With this mod skills points are earned based on (tweakable) time spent doing stuff

title: PlantHarvestTweaker
author: Marcy
dependence: Allows to change the harvested amount and harvest time of all plants in the game. Allows to randomize the item yield between minimum and maximum values. Adds an option to make tools degrade when using them to harvest plants.

title: ImprovedMagnifyingLens
author: Romain
dependence: Add a little realism to lighting a fire with a magnifying glass

title: KeroseneLampTweaks
author: Romain
dependence: Modify the rates of fuel consumption for kerosene lamps, add decay for them and change the color they emit.

title: RemoveCougars
author: moosemeat
dependence: This is a mod for The Long Dark that removes cougars from the various regions they exist.

title: TorchTweaker
author: Romain
dependence: Tweaks a few torch parameters and allow the player to lit torches from lanterns

title: PickWaterFromFishingHoles
author: Romain
dependence: Collect an unlimited amount of non-potable water from freshwater fishing holes.

title: PauseInJournal
author: Romain
dependence: The game will be paused in any category of the Journal

title: BedrollTweaker
author: Romain
dependence:
* Adjust the warmth, the weight, the decay rates for each bedroll type.
* Enable bedrolls to "stack" warmth bonuses

title: CoastalConnection
author: ds5678
dependence:
Connects Coastal Highway and Bleak Inlet by their shared road.

Patreon

title: CustomWhiteout
author: moosemeat
dependence: A mod for the Long Dark letting you experience a custom whiteout challenge.

title: FoodTweaker
author: Romain
dependence: Food Tweaker. What does it do? It tweaks food.

title: SleepWithoutABed
author: Ezinw
dependence: Allows players to sleep without a bed or bedroll. Accessed through the Pass Time option in the radial menu.

title: ImprovedRestForAll
author: Romain
dependence: This mod allows condition recovery from Improved Rest Buff when Condition Recovery During Rest is set to none (Custom Mode).

title: ModComponent
author: STBlade
dependence: Utility Mod; lets you load external item packs.

title: ImprovedAfflictions
author: Fuar
dependence: Improved Afflictions overhauls and changes many of the afflictions to last longer, provide more deadly affects and make the game more challenging.

title: Solstice
author: Romain
dependence: Add seasons into TLD

title: ArrowMod
author: ttr
dependence:
Allows to change duration of crafting arrow and arrowhead. Adds additionall crafting options for arrows.

 Game Restart might be required after settingts change.

title: ToolsQuality
author: ttr
dependence: Keep Your tools sharp. Low condition of tool increase time to perform actions. Adjust harvesting time multiplier of carcass/branches.

title: BlueprintCleaner
author: Romain
dependence:
- This mod adds a little QoL to your Crafting/Cooking Panels.
- It lets you hide/display the Blueprint/recipe you want whenever you want to keep your panels as clean as possible.

title: InDoorTemps
author: ttr
dependence: Indoor temps are aligned with outdoor ones. Shelters (snow, cars, caves) do not add flat bonus anymore.

title: SkillAdjustment
author: Ezinw
dependence: Allows the player to adjust the skill benefits for each level.

title: CarcassYieldTweaker
author: Romain
dependence: Allows adjustment of carcass yield and harvesting time.

title: LocalizationUtilities
author: STBlade
dependence: Utility mod for localized text.

title: AdaptiveArsenal
author: Deadman
dependence: Adaptive Arsenal is a modification that improves upon existing weapon mechanics within The Long Dark.

title: TinyTweaksWakeupCall
author: Waltz
dependence: Allows you to interrupt sleep at will. Has an option to wake up when aurora starts, and a few more

title: SaveManager
author: The Illusion
dependence: Adds the ability to save, load and autosave in Sandbox/Survival using hotkeys. Currently does not re-add the buttons in the pause menu

title: TinyTweaksFallDeathGoat
author: Waltz
dependence: Disables fall death triggers but doubles fall damage (can be tweaked)

title: TinyTweaksPlantsRegrow
author: Waltz
dependence: Plants will now regrow after 45 days (can be changed)

title: StorageProblem
author: BA
dependence: Make container management a minigame.

title: WildlifeTuning
author: BA
dependence: TLD mod that randomizes animal behavior configurations.

title: Moment
author: BA
dependence: Modding utility for mods to monitor ingame time and schedule events.

title: NotSoSilly
author: BA
dependence: Enable physics for gears placed down for 10 seconds so you can drop your stuff around naturally, or pile up items with the power of gravity. Aims to be practical to use in Survival. Still somewhat risky, check readme for proper usage.

title: SaveSafety
author: BA
dependence: This mod explicitly warns you when saving or loading patches are not successfully executed so you know it's time to quit without saving.

title: SurvivorsLegacy
author: BA
dependence: Enables a minimal multiplayer interaction: Let other players find your corpse (sort of).

title: RecipeRequirements
author: Ezinw
dependence: Allows the player to adjust the cooking skill level required to create specific recipes.

title: AfflictionComponent
author: Fuar
dependence: A framework mod that allows modders to add their own custom afflictions to the game.

title: AmmunitionCraftingTools
author: Sm4rtBoyTom
dependence: This mod adds tools for crafting ammunition in the field. You don't need ammunition workbench to craft cartridges anymore. Crafting ammunition using the tools takes significantly longer.

title: MapManager
author: The Illusion
dependence:
Show Player Arrow
Center on player
Reveal Map
Survey Mapping Options:
- Modify Range
- Modify Surveying Time
- Automatic use of Polaroid's (even if you don't have them)
Automatically add corpses to the map

title: ItemRarities
author: Deadman
dependence: Item Rarities is a modification that gives each item within The Long Dark a sense of exclusivity.

title: UniversalTweaks
author: Deadman
dependence: Universal Tweaks is a modification that enhances existing gameplay elements by modifying things within The Long Dark, that just makes sense.

title: ExamineActionsAPI
author: BA
dependence: Modding framework for custom Examine actions.

title: ThingsToDo
author: BA
dependence: Demo mod for EAAPI, provides some useful actions.

title: CoolHome
author: yasenfire
dependence: No safe places anymore. This mod removes any temperature bonus to shelters. Use fires, torches, flares and other sources of heat. Properly heated shelters will stay warm for some time even without fires.

title: PineNeedleTea
author: Marcy
dependence: Adds pine needles spawning around the world which can be turned into a herbal tea high in Vitamin C. Highly customizable.

title: VitaminCTracker
author: The Illusion
dependence: Finally know how much Vitamin C you have! No longer will you live in ignorance

title: Watches
author: Deadman
dependence: A modification which alters how time is told within The Long Dark.

title: CanneryManufacturing
author: Varrxion
dependence: Designed to improve the usability of the Last Resort Cannery Workshop in Bleak Inlet, especially on Interloper difficulty.

title: ImprovedCougar
author: Fuar
dependence: A gameplay mod that adds and changes mechanics surrounding the Cougar

title: ClothingTweaker2
author: Waltz
dependence: Clothing Tweaker reimagined. Allows you to edit clothing stats on the go

title: HarvestYieldTweaker
author: Fuar
dependence: A gameplay mod that allows users to change how much yield breaking down certain items gives.

title: SurvivorKnowledge
author: Fuar
dependence: Simulates survivor knowledge by locking crafting recipes and harvesting actions behind skill levels.

title: Candlelight
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Adds candles and new materials to craft candles

title: CaffeinatedSodas
author: Marcy
dependence: Sodas now reduce fatigue, with customizable amount for each soda. Since sodas often contain caffeine and are high in sugar they're bound to give you at least a little kick, right?

title: UnityExplorerTLD
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: UnityExplorer with optimizations for TLD

title: MoreCameraSpawns
author: Fuar
dependence: A gameplay mod that adds new spawns for the instant camera around Lower Great Bear

title: ComplexLogger
author: The Illusion
dependence: A mod that adds more complex logging to the game

title: PastimeReading
author: Waltz
dependence:
Adds a readable, customizable book with animations and stuff.

Showcasing video. Detailed review(has subtitles).

Mod is installed by extracting .zip into .../Mods/

title: Personality
author: Waltz
dependence:
!!! Most features are gone, see release notes for current features. Also remove old version of the mod before updating if you still had it !!!

Lets you customize your character: replace textures and change outfit. Here's a funny showcasing video.

Installed by unpacking it into .../Mods/

title: TinyTweaksRunWithLantern
author: Waltz
dependence: Removes restrictions on lantern animation: allows movement and removes camera lock

title: BowRepair
author: Marcy
dependence: Makes all bows repairable, with customizable cost and location.

title: CougarSoundBegone
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Kills the stupid cougar in the main menu on startup

title: ImprovedClothing
author: Fuar
dependence: Adds clothing wetness from walking in snow and ice, animal attacks and a new quick way to place clothing items right off your body.

title: DynamicTrees
author: Fuar
dependence: Dynamic Trees replaces the foliage texture of trees dynamically to represent accumulating snowfall to add another level of immersion to the game.

title: DynamicWorld
author: Fuar
dependence: Adds dynamic events including earthquakes to make the world of Great Bear feel more dynamic and change over time.

title: CraftingRevisions
author: STBlade
dependence: Improves the Crafting UI and enables custom Blueprint/Recipe creation.

title: SeasonedInterloping
author: ds5678
dependence:
Adds Forsaken Airfield, Bleak Inlet, Zone of Contamination, & Sundered Pass to the list of Interloper start regions.

Patreon

title: FrozenFood
author: Fuar
dependence: Frozen Food aims to add a bit more realism to the game by allowing food items to become frozen over time.

title: DrawFromDrawer
author: yasenfire
dependence: This mod allows you to craft on workbenches using contents of its drawer. Works with ammo benches too.

title: LitharsMending
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Lets you repair ruined clothing items

title: DIYbySantana
author: Atlas Lumi
dependence: Adds craftable furniture.

title: Solitaire
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Waste your time in style - play Solitaire

title: MoreLockedDoors
author: Fuar
dependence: Adds more locks to doors and buildings around the game world.

title: AudioManager
author: Digitalzombie
dependence:
Helper mod for using custom audioclips and controlling vanilla audio. 

Disable flare audio, disable waterfall audio adjust wind effect volume (eg. like clattering) when indoors, adjust aurora music volume

title: DeveloperConsole
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: A mod that makes Hinterland's developer console accessible in-game. F1 to open / close the console, type 'help' to get a list of commands.

title: NorthernLightsBroadcast
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Watch your favorite movies and series in TLD

title: AuroraMonitor
author: The Illusion
dependence: A WIP mod that will eventually allow full control of weather. Currently allows control of Aurorae and will show weather stats in the First Aid screen

title: RetroFoodPack
author: Thekillergreece
dependence: 23 Retro Food items.

title: AutoUpdatingPlugin
author: STBlade
dependence: Plugin. Updates most Mods & Plugins automatically.

title: ModData
author: STBlade
dependence: A utility mod for TLD that lets other mods save data independently of the save file.

title: ReducedLoot
author: Fuar
dependence: Reduced Loot reduces the amount of certain items in the world by despawning them when they randomly spawn.

title: AdditionalMiserySpawns
author: BigFish
dependence: Adds more spawn locations in misery mode

title: MiseryinCustomGames
author: BigFish
dependence:
Adds custom setting to enable misery afflictions in any custom run. 
Vanilla: regular misery timeline
OnSpawn: start a run with all afflictions already applied

title: RecordingUtils
author: BigFish
dependence:
Adds some animal and camera control for recording purposes. 
Also adds freebird implementation by @Digitalzombie

title: EdiblePlants
author: Marcy
dependence: Makes harvested plants such as rosehips edible. Vitamin C and Calories are customizable for each item. Allows to move the items to the food category for ease of use.

title: PhotoofaLovedOne
author: Atlas Lumi
dependence: Allows you to carry a customizable picture of something you care about.

title: RunInBackground
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Keeps the game running, when it looses focus

title: YesIKnow
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Disables the hovertext on items and/or fire

title: EternalWeather
author: Deadman
dependence: Eternal Weather is a modification that allows the player to change the weather from a wide arrange of states that is set for an infinite amount of time.

title: ImprovedLoadingScreens
author: Fuar
dependence: A mod that improves the loading screens of the game with custom tips, background images and the ability to enable or disable various aspects of the loading screens.

title: CozyBlankets
author: Jods-Its
dependence: Keep you warmer in those cold, winter nights. Original by ds5678.

title: FirePackDLC
author: Jods-Its
dependence: New renewable tools for starting fires. Original by ds5678 and WulfMarius.

title: CampingTools
author: Jods-Its
dependence: Tools for outdoors adventures.

title: Leatherworks
author: TonisGaming
dependence: Adds a way to renew leather from hide, the ability to make certain leather clothing, and adds tree bark, that can be utilized for many different utilities, like flour, food and string

title: ModdersGearToolbox
author: Jods-Its
dependence: This mod aims to help other modders by adding 'generic' materials and tools for them to use in their mods. Full list of items in the GitHub repo.

title: Jump
author: Waltz
dependence: Allows you to jump. Also has some settings. Installed by dropping it into .../Mods/

title: Muscle
author: BA
dependence: Eat well, move a lot and properly sleep, then you will gain muscle.

title: StackManager
author: The Illusion
dependence: Adds stacking to more stuff

title: RNStrippedfunctions
author: RN mod
dependence: Carcass moving and Light torches from electricals - extracted from Relentless Nights mod (check it out!)

title: ClothingExpanded
author: TonisGaming
dependence: Adds a way to combine accessories with clothing to have even more accessories equipped at the same time

title: StruggleTweaks
author: ttr
dependence: Set chance to instantly kill wolf after struggle or change bleedout time for wolf. Also you can change tap power to save your mouse buttons

title: CollectorCards
author: Kaiusername
dependence: Find a collection of hand-painted cards hidden across Great Bear!

title: DualSenseX
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Check instructions on github

title: DeveloperConsoleWintermute
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Console for storymode. Check the release notes for detailed instructions

title: AdjustableWalkSpeed
author: Fuar
dependence: Adjustable Walk Speed allows players to adjust the walk speed with scroll wheel inputs to be slower for more cinematic moments.

title: AudioCore
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: THIS IS A PLUGIN!!! PLUGIN!!! PLUGIN!!! PLUGIN!!! PLUGIN!!! PLUGIN!!! PLUGIN!!! PLUGIN!!!

title: DeadAir
author: TonisGaming
dependence: IT IS HIGHLY SUGGESTED TO USE THIS ON ONLY NEW SAVES. Turns the entirety of Great Bear into a toxic wasteland, similar to ZoC's chemical pools. Expect issues

title: ToolUpgrade
author: TonisGaming
dependence: Adds alternate ways of acquiring item variants and other items by way of blueprints

title: AlcoholMod
author: BA
dependence: An optional addon for ModComponent enabling the alcohol mechanics. Without this, all alcoholic food functions as if it were non-alcoholic.

title: FiligranisSkills
author: BA
dependence: Custom skill API

title: UniqueKnowledge
author: BA
dependence: Read each book only once.

title: CanisterRefill
author: TonisGaming
dependence: Adds the ability to refill empty canisters used by the respirator

title: InterloperRegionSelection
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
dependence: This mod lets you select the spawn region in Interloper mode.

title: ExtraGraphicsSettings
author: The Illusion
dependence: A mod that adds more options for graphical things.

title: TheLongDevelopmentRegions
author: Kaiusername
dependence: A small team project and a collaborative community effort to expand Great Bear Island in a beautiful and balanced way.

title: HowToRead
author: The Illusion
dependence: This mod is intended to catch users that do not read. This mod shouldnt be installed. If you are reading this, then you passed the test.

title: TLDsavetools
author: TacticalEx
dependence: Simple tools for managing game saves for The Long Dark. Note: this is an external tool, not a mod.

title: UseTheWorstFirstAndDropStone
author: Romain
dependence:
Allows you to use the worst condition items first in radial menu and other cases.
Allows you to drop stones/tinders instead of decoy to mark paths. 
See ReadMe for more details.

title: BleedingRevamped
author: Romain
dependence: Revamped bleeding mechanic for animals.

title: TargetPracticeAndMasterHunter
author: Romain
dependence:
Target Practice : Provides a bunch training features allowing you to practice and have fun.
Master Hunter : Offers numerous options to block your automatic, effortless progression through skill levels, ensuring that you earn them more.
See ReadMe for more details.

title: Halloween
author: TLD Modding Community
dependence: Howl-oween - Brought to you by the Discord Modding Community

title: TinyTweaksPauseOnRadial
author: Waltz
dependence: Slows down time when bringing up radial menus

title: CozyCushions
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: 14 craftable pillows; sit on other objects like chairs, benches, toilets; optional buffs

title: IndoorsGreenery
author: Jods-Its
dependence: Make your own indoor farm and regrow plants.

title: BetterWaterManagement
author: STBlade
dependence:
Mod improving the way water is managed for The Long Dark.

Installation Instructions

title: Sprainkle
author: The Illusion
dependence: A new and improved mod that entirely replaces the old ankle sprain mod. This mod contains separate settings for ankle and wrist sprains as well as settings for general sprains

title: FasterHarvesting
author: The Illusion
dependence: Adds customization options to change the time it takes to harvest things

title: RadialMenuUtilities
author: The Illusion
dependence: A utility mod that adds the ability for other mods to create custom radial menus.

title: RelentlessNight
author: ShieldHeart
dependence:
TLD 2.23 use RN 4.7.2, TLD 2.19 use RN 4.7.1, TLD 2.10+ use RN 4.6.3, TLD 2.06&2.08 use RN 4.6.1
The spin of the earth is slowing. Days and nights are getting longer. Every long night gets colder and harsher than the last. Nowhere is safe from the cold. How long will you survive in this eerie new world?

You can keep up with mod discussion, updates, and report any issues at our Relentless Mods discord channel with this - INVITE.

title: BountifulForaging
author: Jods-Its
dependence: Find food and useful materials in the wild. Non-DLC compatible version in the GitHub repo.

title: MotionTracker
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Adds a minimap that can show animals and spraypaint markings

title: SkipIntroRedux
author: STBlade
dependence:
Allows the player to skip to the main menu when starting the game.

Use at your own risk - Now skips those pesky disclaimers.

title: BetterBases
author: Xpazeman
dependence: Mod for The Long Dark that allows players to improve their bases in multiple ways: Most furniture can be moved (if you have cleared it of clutter first), most broken cabinets and drawers can be fixed, most of the clutter on interiors can be removed and some of it can also be moved.

title: GearSpawner
author: STBlade
dependence: Utility mod for spawning modded items.

title: ForgeBlueprintsDLC
author: Jods-Its
dependence: More blueprints in the forge. Original by ds5678.

title: ExtremeTemperatureDrop
author: The Illusion
dependence: Alters temperature degradation

title: TLDMorphine
author: Atlas Lumi
dependence: Adds Morphine as a usable item

title: CraftingHotkey
author: BA
dependence: Adds a hotkey for the crafting menu.

title: RerollBurntBuildings
author: Cass
dependence: Adds console commands that allow you to reroll the random burnt building spawns. Now also includes the random fishing hut doors. Full instructions in the README.

title: ShelterTemperatureTweaks
author: Cass
dependence: Allows you to tweak the temperature of shelters that have NO LOADING SCREEN, such as the Mountaineer's Hut. Full instructions in the README.

title: ChooseStartingConditions
author: Cass
dependence: Allows you to choose your starting condition, fatigue, hunger, thirst, warmth, injuries and illnesses when starting a new game. Full instructions in the README.

title: WolvesComeOutAtNight
author: Cass
dependence: Prevents wolves spawning during the day. Can set by region or to apply everywhere. Full instructions in the README.

title: WoodenStatuesbyTKG
author: Thekillergreece
dependence: Introduces 4 wooden animal statues, small and large.

title: InteriorWallDecorations
author: Atlas Lumi
dependence: Let's you decorate your base with pictures, and upload your own.

title: TLDCigarettes
author: Atlas Lumi
dependence: Adds usable Cigarettes

title: ItemPiles
author: Atlas Lumi
dependence: Adds blueprints for stacked items.

title: ItemPicker
author: Digitalzombie
dependence:
Skip item inspection on picking up stick/stones or other items.

Mass pickup of all sticks/stones or other items in a radius around you. With or without calorie cost.

Full customizable.

title: LimitlessContainerSpace
author: Atlas Lumi
dependence: Increases the capacity of all containers to 10000KG

title: InfiniteFires
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Set fires to infinite duration with middle mousebutton

title: LonelyOrca
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: A classic mod ported over to post-DLC TLD. A lonely orca is living in Desolation Point.

title: TimberwolvesAnywhere
author: STBlade
dependence: Allows the user to decide what type of wolves will spawn in a region.

title: FullSwing
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Adds options to modify swing speed and radius of fridge doors

title: AlternativeActionUtilities
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: A utility mod for custom actions when clicking on things.

title: StoryModeCollectibles
author: Atlas Lumi
dependence: Adds collectible items from Wintermute into survival mode.

title: TLDWolfskinScarf
author: Atlas Lumi
dependence: Adds a new craftable scarf made of wolf fur.

title: FasterSearching
author: MikeyPdog
dependence: Speeds up the search action on containers and makes searching instant for empty containers.

title: FixSteamWorkshopItems
author: STBlade
dependence: Very quick mod to re-enable workshop localization files

title: TinyTweaksBuryCorpses
author: Waltz
dependence:
REDUNDANT since Safehouse Customization has same function. But still works

Get rid of those nasty corpses by right-clicking on them

title: CoordinatesGrabber
author: ds5678
dependence:
Utility mod. Allows you to see/copy the name, position, rotation, and scene of interactive items.

Patreon

title: TinyTweaksCorrectDropOrientation
author: Waltz
dependence: Fix dropped wooden matches and rifle to be in correct orientation. Because yes, they were incorrect

title: TinyTweaksExtendedFOV
author: Waltz
dependence: Extend FOV slider to 150

title: TinyTweaksMapTextOutline
author: Waltz
dependence: Outline text on the map, so you can actually see what it says. Has a few variants

title: SillyMod
author: Waltz
dependence:
Enables fun: gear items physics, collisions and more

Don't use it on your normal save, you'll regret it

title: KeyboardUtilities
author: ds5678
dependence:
A utility mod that enables other mods to more easily use keyboard and mouse input.

Patreon

title: TimeAccelerator
author: ds5678
dependence:
Allows the player to speed up time without changing the game difficulty.

Patreon

title: AmbientLights
author: Xpazeman
dependence: This mod aims to modify the default lightning for interiors with windows, making them brighter so you don't need a light source during midday to move around, and also more reflective of what's happening outside (time of day, weather, and sun position).

title: ExportJournal
author: STBlade
dependence: A mod for The Long Dark (2.06+) which allows the player to export the journal data of the active save game.

title: DarkerNights
author: Xpazeman
dependence: Mod for The Long Dark to make nights darker, giving a new challenge.

title: IndoorCampfires
author: Xpazeman
dependence: This mod allows you to create campfires indoors.

title: RandomMainMenu
author: Xpazeman
dependence: This mod randomizes the time and weather in the main menu screen so it changes everytime you enter it.

title: WorkingClocks
author: Xpazeman
dependence: Mod for The Long Dark that makes some of the clocks in the game work.

title: SkyCoop
author: Filigrani
dependence: Multiplayer mod for the game

title: SunOrientationFixes
author: Cass
dependence: Fixes the sun orientation in several regions. Now all regions should be consistent with each other and the world map.

title: PlacingAnywhere
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: Mod for The Long Dark that removes restrictions when placing items, and adds controls to rotate and position the object.

title: AfraidoftheDark
author: Atlas Lumi
dependence: Makes the player anxious at night.

title: ImprovedSoundtrack
author: Fuar
dependence: Improves the in game soundtrack by adding new conditions to play rare or removed music tracks from the OST. Including new location discovered stingers.

title: ChooseStartingGear
author: Cass
dependence: Allows you to choose your starting gear when starting a new game. Full instructions in the README.

title: SilentProtagonist
author: Cass
dependence: Silences player character voice. Full instructions in the README.

title: ChooseStartingLocation
author: Cass
dependence: Allows you to choose your starting location when starting a new Sandbox game. 300+ locations, all regions, all difficulty modes. Full instructions in the README.

title: HouseBasements
author: ds5678
dependence:
Adds some more basements to the game.

Patreon

title: Binoculars
author: ds5678
dependence:
Lets you see farther.

Installation Instructions

Patreon

title: RandomizeInterloperRareSpawns
author: ds5678
dependence:
Disables the Interloper loot tables and replaces them with new random spawns. Do not use on existing saves.

Installation Instructions

Patreon

title: CustomSaveDataUtilities
author: ds5678
dependence:
Utility mod for custom save data on gear items.

Patreon

title: FoxCompanion
author: Digitalzombie
dependence: A little fox companion for the lonely TLD player.

title: MaintainYourself
author: Deus
dependence: This adds options to customize condition gain. This can make condition recovery much harder or easier, by making recovery proportional to your needs.

title: NonOPTorches
author: Deus
dependence: This mod makes torches less overpowered.

title: DisableCabinFever
author: ds5678
dependence:
Disables Cabin Fever in all game modes.

Patreon

title: ToggleHUD
author: ds5678
dependence:
Allows the player to toggle the scent and time-of-day indicators instead of them disappearing after some time.

Patreon

title: MapMakerTools
author: ds5678
dependence: Mod aiding in mapping the terrain for The Long Dark

title: BeachcombingAdjustments
author: ds5678
dependence:
Lets you change the loot table for beachcombing.

Patreon

title: SaveImageFilter
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
dependence: Saves and reloads your chosen image filter (Options > Display > Image Filter) instead of reverting to 'no filter' every time the game is restarted.

title: TinCanImprovements
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
dependence: Allows you to craft 4 tin cans into 1 scrap metal, reduces the weight of tin cans to 0.05 kg, fixes a canned food item weight bug.
